title: Refrigerator Defrost Heater
description: Refrigerator Defrost Heater ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 3 Reviews PartSelect Number PS3504321 Manufacturer Part Number 242044008 The defrost heater is in the evaporator section at the rear of the freezer. This heater melts frost off of the evaporator coils.

installationInstructions.author: JEFF from OLIVET, MI
installationInstructions.title: FREEZER WAS COLD FRIDGE WARM
installationInstructions.content: YOU TUBE VIDEO POINTED ME IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION. USED MULTI METER TO CHECK FOR VOLTAGE. NONE, REPLACED DEFROST HEATER. WORKS LIKE A CHARM, PART DELIVERED TO MY DOOR FOR LESS THAN $60.00, IN TWO DAYS FROM PARTSELECT. FIXED IT MYSELF FOR LESS THAN THE COST OF A SERVICE CALL.
